comment: All the terms are male terms of address, except when specified.
Used to related women who have about the same age of ego.
Also used to women younger than ego.
Also used to very old men.
Also used to very old women.
Also used to very young children.
-hit can also denote age lower than that of ego's mother
Women of ego's clan are called apii if they are about the age of ego's father.
hamu and hapoap are reciprocal terms.
Also used to younger males of ego mother's clan.
Also used to all men of husband's clan.
